devdoc.author: Stability Labs Pty. Ltd.
devdoc.details: Derives from ./StakingRewards.sol and implements a secondary token into the core logic

balanceOf(address).details: Get the balance of a given account

params._account: User for which to retrieve balance

claimReward().details: Claims outstanding rewards (both platform and native) for the sender. First updates outstanding reward allocation and then transfers.

claimRewardOnly().details: Claims outstanding rewards for the sender. Only the native rewards token, and not the platform rewards

constructor.details: StakingRewards is a TokenWrapper and RewardRecipient

earned(address).details: Calculates the amount of unclaimed rewards a user has earned

exit().details: Withdraws stake from pool and claims any rewards

lastTimeRewardApplicable().details: Gets the last applicable timestamp for this reward period

notifyRewardAmount(uint256).details: Notifies the contract that new rewards have been added. Calculates an updated rewardRate based on the rewards in period.

params._reward: Units of RewardToken that have been added to the pool

rewardPerToken().details: Calculates the amount of unclaimed rewards a user has earned

setRewardsDistribution(address).details: Change the rewardsDistributor - only called by mStable governor

stake(address,uint256).details: Stakes a given amount of the StakingToken for a given beneficiary

params._beneficiary: Staked tokens are credited to this address

stake(uint256).details: Stakes a given amount of the StakingToken for the sender

totalSupply().details: Get the total amount of the staked token

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraws given stake amount from the pool

params._amount: Units of the staked token to withdraw

devdoc.title: StakingRewardsWithPlatformToken

userdoc.notice: Rewards stakers of a given LP token (a.k.a StakingToken) with RewardsToken, on a pro-rata basis additionally, distributes the Platform token airdropped by the platform
